prompts: Create a strong, bipedal Pokemon with a blue color scheme and spikes on its back.
Generate a regal-looking Pokemon that embodies both earth and poison elements.
Show me a female Pokemon with a fierce expression and a sturdy, muscular build.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in various habitats, including mountains and caves.
Imagine a Pokemon that has both defensive and offensive capabilities in battle.
Design a creature with a prominent crown-like feature and a love for nature.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique dual typing that showcases its versatility in combat.
